name: Recycle-Me Soy Candle LAZY LEMONGRASS(tm)
description: Clarify and relax while lazy lemongrass melts into the air. Only the blast of lemongrass essential oil is used for a fortified theraputic fog. Fill your casa with a new therapeutic aroma with nettiescrub candles. Infused with pure essential oils! Contains 100% soy, cotton wick, & natural essential oil blend for fragrance. Hand poured in storage jars for great portability. 4 oz./ up to 25 hrs HEY! GOTTA LIGHT…....YES! nettiescrub candles come with a 10 stem matchbook attached! Please recycle you jar! Thanks for your support : )

Aromatic, grapefruit, geranium, and cedarwood essential oils blend together in a fresh citrus-forest scent to dramatically enhance to atmosphere of any rooom. Fill your CASA with a new therapeutic aroma with nettiescrub candles. Infused with pure essential oils! Contains 100% soy, cotton wick, & natural essential oil blend for fragrance. Hand poured in storage jars for great portability. 4 oz./ up to 25 hrs HEY! GOTTA LIGHT…....YES! nettiescrub candles come with a 10 stem matchbook attached! Please recycle you jar! Thanks for your support : )

name: Cedarmint Milkbar Soap
description:
Spring forward with a vivid scent of cedarmint in this 6.6 oz milkbar. A strong mix of grapefruit, geranium, cedarwood and eucalyptus will get you out and going. Shea butter, goat’s milk, and grape seed oil all have wholesome vitamins to keep your skin at its best. Handcrafted with love in socal!

	Biodegradable and made from 100 percent vegetable base. All of the products that we purchase for making our soaps have not been tested on animals.

	This listing is for 1 bar of soap

	Ingredients: goats mik, shea butter, essentials oil of grapefruit, geranium, cedarwod, and eucalyptus, sodium cocoate, sodium palmate, castor seed oil, safflower seed oil, glycerin, water, sorbitol, sorbitan oleate, soybean protein, titanium dioxide

	The soap bars are approx. 6.6oz in weight.

name: Lemon Milkbar Soap
description:
A vibrant 6.6 oz milkbar infused with lemon and lemongrass essential oils. Goat’s milk, shea butter, and grape seed oil will leave you totally refreshed and ready to go. Sure give you that burst of energy during sud time.

	Biodegradable and made from 100 percent vegetable base. All of the products that we purchase for making our soaps have not been tested on animals.

	This listing is for 1 bar of soap

	Ingredients: goats mik, shea butter, pure lemon and lemongrass essentials oil, sodium cocoate, sodium palmate, castor seed oil, safflower seed oil, glycerin, water, sorbitol, sorbitan oleate, soybean protein, titanium dioxide

	The soap bars are approx. 6.6oz in weight.

name: Natural Lemon Body Buff (sugar scrub)
description: An awesome gift for anyone! Wake up wih a vivid swirl of sugar, grape seed oil, and pure lemon essential oil. Lemon essential oil stimulates the brain, supplying emotional clarity and physical energy. It also cleans skin as a natural antibiotic and disinfectant. An ideal treat after shaving or waxing. Leaves skin sweet smelling without the oily residue. No dyes and organic additives makes this popular paste a must have. Available in 4 fl oz. lock lid, glass jars with applicators attached! Active Ingredients: Grapefruit Seed Extract – is a natural antibiotic, disinfectant and preservative. It is used to promote the healing of almost any atypical skin condition. Grapefruit seed extract is also extremely good for fast healing of scar tissue associated with many types of wounds. Pure alpha hydroxyl acids within the sugar exfoliate and detoxify – giving skin a new revitalized texture. Grape seed oil is a preferred ingredient for damaged and stressed tissues, possessing regenerative and restructuring qualities which allow a better control of skin moisturization. Used as an all-over skin moisturizer, grape seed oil is known to reduce the look of stretch marks. Grape seed oil contains Vitamin E, Vitamin C, linoleic acid, and Beta-Carotene If you’re in the Los Angeles area, please visit WWW.NETTIESCRUB.COM for store locations!
